content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TOX
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --TOXGR
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000102
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TOX is not empty, but --TOXGR is empty.
Outcome:
  Message: --TOXGR should not be null when --TOX is populated.
  Output Variables:
    - --TOX
    - --TOXGR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0428
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --TOX
                Section: Events|Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE
      - MH
      - CE
      - EG
      - LB
      - PC
      - PP

json.Description: Raise an error when --TOX is not empty, but --TOXGR is empty.

Outcome.Message: --TOXGR should not be null when --TOX is populated.
